action_item.title: Add business description
action_item.desc: Tell customers about your business.

action_item.title: Add featured image
action_item.desc: An image that describes your business visually.

action_item.title: Add business hours
action_item.desc: Mention the hours during which you are available to customers.

action_item.title: Add business contact details
action_item.desc: Make it easy for customers to get in touch with you.

action_item.title: Custom domain & SSL security
action_item.desc: Add a branded name to website & enable security.

action_item.title: Post 3 updates
action_item.desc: Add updates like new products, tips, offers, events etc.

action_item.title: Add 2 services to catalogue
action_item.desc: This will make it easier for customers to schedule an appointment.

action_item.title: Add 2 products to catalogue
action_item.desc: This will make it easier for customers to browse and order online.

action_item.title: Add bank account
action_item.desc: All your online payments will be sent to this account.

action_item.title: Catalog setup
action_item.desc: Specify your catalogue name and add tax slab.

action_item.title: General appointments
action_item.desc: Add consultation charges & duration to improve booking experience.

action_item.title: Business Verification
action_item.desc: Complete GST/Business PAN verification to start selling online.

action_item.title: Upload images to gallery
action_item.desc: Add images to improve customer engagement on website.

action_item.title: Create a custom page
action_item.desc: Add unique content to your website with the Boost WYSWIG editor.

action_item.title: Share business card with customers
action_item.desc: Send your digital business card via Whatsapp or other social media.

action_item.title: Create a sample In-clinic appointment
action_item.desc: Explore how to manage your patient appointments.

action_item.title: Create a sample video consultation
action_item.desc: Now offer tele-medicine interactions to all your patients.

action_item.title: Respond to customer enquiries
action_item.desc: Explore how to manage all your online enquiries.

action_item.title: Add staff
action_item.desc: Add detailed information about your staff to build credibility and trust amongst clients.
